lead_paragraph: GRANT--Alfred D.,M.D., passed away on May 26, 2016 at the age of 82. Beloved husband, father, grandfather, uncle, friend, and not least of all, doctor. He is survived by Ellen Michels Grant, Michele Grant, Laura Grant Dagan, the late Susan Grant Kaplansky, Edan, Shir, Tamir, Gil and Eliyah Kaplansky; Danielle and Sean Dagan; Jeffrey Michels and Gustavo Carillo. He is Loved by many and will be Missed by all. Service 11:30am today at "The Riverside" 76 Street and Amsterdam Avenue. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GRANT, ALFRED D.
